sentences.english: Learn how to draw tubes using perspective lines in this free video art lesson.
sentences.chinese: 學習如何繪製在這個自由錄像藝術課使用透視線管。

sentences.english: Owner drawn controls and sub classing in WTL if you want to understand the source.
sentences.chinese: 所有者繪製控制和在WTL分級分，如果你想了解源。

sentences.english: It has been mapped by using ground-penetrating radar and seismic tests.
sentences.chinese: 人們已經用探地雷達和地震測試把它繪製出來。

sentences.english: After the individual components were graphed, it was easy to spot this problem.
sentences.chinese: 在對各個組件繪製圖表之後，很容易確定此問題。

sentences.english: This precise drawing glimmers in the architectural detail.
sentences.chinese: 這在建築細部的繪製曙光。

sentences.english: Draw the camera textured with selection wireframe and no background clearing.
sentences.chinese: 繪製帶紋理的相機，帶有選擇線框和無背景清除。

sentences.english: Sky 3D Engine (OpenGL) - Engine for 3D Games and for other 3D Programs or Renderers.
sentences.chinese: 是爲3D遊戲和其它3D程序或繪製器提供的引擎。

sentences.english: The growth curve was drawn by the method of methyl-thiazol-tetrazolium (MTT).
sentences.chinese: 四甲基偶氮唑鹽法繪製生長曲線。

sentences.english: This method can be simply applied to GPU-based 3D texture ray-casting algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 並結合基於3D紋理的GPU光線投射算法完成繪製。

sentences.english: He draws this schema exactly as I have represented it for you on the blackboard.
sentences.chinese: 他畫出這個基型，如同我在黑板上所繪製的。

sentences.english: You can rotate your square by defining how you draw your object.
sentences.chinese: 您可以通過定義對象的繪製方式來旋轉您的正方形。

sentences.english: Draw textured with overlaid lightmap resolution grid.
sentences.chinese: 繪製帶有覆蓋光照貼圖分辨率網格紋理。

sentences.english: To create the embossing effect, the text is drawn twice.
sentences.chinese: 若要創建浮雕效果，請將文本繪製兩次。

sentences.english: Clouds were done with a basic airbrush on an additional layer.
sentences.chinese: 在另一個圖層上用基本的噴槍繪製韻。

sentences.english: It can plot diversified Isoline Figure and 3-D solid figure.
sentences.chinese: 可以繪製各種等值線圖和三維立體圖。

sentences.english: For the map carvers, you are clearing the road for the ascending children.
sentences.chinese: 對地圖繪製者而言，你正在爲提升孩童淨化道路。

definition: to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
to include (in a collection)/to put together (stories, poems etc)/to record/to employ/to recruit
to appear/to emerge/to present (a certain appearance)/to demonstrate
